name: Attack+
description: Increase attack by 40

name: Defense+
description: Increase Defense by 40

name: Rage
description: Rage + 0.7

name: Drain
description: Lifesteal + 10%

name: Sacrifice
description: Sacrifice + 10%

name: Adrenaline
description: Tempo + 1

name: Pierce
description: Have a 15% chance to ignore defenses

name: Spikes
description: Spikes + 0.5

name: Vengeance
description: Have a 2% chance to instantly kill your opponent when attacked.

name: Opportunity
description: Have a 6% chance to hit a critical

name: Parry
description: Have a 15% chance to block any attack.

name: Bolster
description: Gain the ability to !bolster other players other than yourself (Activate with !bolster [target])

name: Vitality
description: Gain increased stats while at full health

name: Advantage
description: Double the effects of triangle advantage

name: Angelic
description: Healing costs 0 and resurrecting others doesn't cause you to take damage

name: Soulsteal
description: After you kill something, steal an amount of health equal to the max health of the enemy you kill.

name: Royalty
description: Earn 50% more money and xp

name: Reckless
description: Increase Attack by 60, but decrease Defense by 60

name: Offensive Strike
description: Gain 20% Attack

name: Defensive Stance
description: Gain 20% Defense

name: Combo
description: Have a higher chance of hitting critical hits after consecutive attacks.

name: Indulgence
description: Gain 50% lifesteal at full health

name: Leech
description: Steal 5% of your opponents max health while attacking. Cannot kill your opponent.

name: Confusion
description: Swap the attack and defense of other players during combat

name: Regeneration
description: Regenerate 7hp/second

name: LastBreath
description: While you have at least 75% health remaining and take fatal damage, prevent it and set your health to 1. Has a cooldown of 3 minutes.

name: Chthonic
description: You take no damage from sacrificing, but do 20% less damage from sacrifice

name: Odysseus
description: Critical Chance +2%; Crit Damage +100%

name: Coeus
description: Pierce Chance +5% Whenever you pierce through defenses, deal 25% more damage

name: Dies Irae
description: Rage + 0.3; Rage assumes your health is 7/8 of its true value

name: Aegis
description: Block +5%; Whenever you block or guard an attack, you become bolstered

name: Aura Ignition
description: Spikes + 20%; Burn + 2

name: Nemesis
description: Revenge +0.5%; Double the chances of instantly killing your opponent

name: Epinephrine
description: Gain increased defense through consecutive attacks.

name: Speed Healing
description: Healing has a much shorter cooldown

name: Craftsmanship
description: Merging has a much shorter cooldown

name: Pyromancy
description: Enemies you fight become burned for 4 commands and take damage over time

name: Dispel
description: Ignores the opponent's tempo

name: Aqua Shield
description: Ignores the opponent's burn

name: Dodge
description: Evade +3%

name: Invisibility
description: Ignores the opponent's spikes

name: Purify
description: When healing, removes all status effects

name: Save State
description: Keeps your tempo while healing or travelling. Has a 3 minute cooldown.

name: Haste
description: Haste +2

name: Last Stand
description: When under 10% hp, the effect of lifesteal is increased by 50%

name: Blood Sacrifice
description: When at full hp, the effect of sacrifice is increased by 50%

name: Iron Skin
description: Reduces all incoming damage by 20%

name: Strengthened Shield
description: Increases your defensive multiplier by 5

name: Swift Strike
description: If you kill your enemy, you do not take damage.
